```{r}
d0 <- fread("../data/clean/merged_cleaned_data.csv")

library(BayesFactor)

ttestBF(formula = response_num ~ condition, data = d0)

library(BFpack)
m1 <- lm(response_num ~ condition, d0)
m1

m1_bf <- BF(m1, hypothesis = "condition = 0")
m1_bf
summary(m1_bf)

```
